mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(sfi.DATE_FROM,'2000-01-01') as dateFrom, IFNULL(sfi.STRUCTURED,'N') as structured, IFNULL(sfi.MF,'N') as mf, IFNULL(sfi.AC,'N') as ac, IFNULL(sfi.ETF,'N') as etf, IFNULL(sfi.COMPOUND,'单利') as compound, IFNULL(sfi.NAV_ROUND, 4) as navRound, sfi.ROR_BASELINE as rorBaseline, sfi.ROR as ror, sfi.LEVERAGE as leverage, IFNULL(sfi.LOF,'N') as lof, 'N' as interestSensitivity, IFNULL(sfi.dealer_seperate,'N') as dealerSeperate, IFNULL(sfi.LEVEL_SHARE,'N') as levelShare, IFNULL(sfi.ETF_CONNECTION,'N') as etfConnection, IFNULL(sfi.FOF,'N') as fof, IF(IFNULL(sfi.DATE_FROM,'2000-01-01')>=concat(left(#{period},4)-1,'-11-01'),'Y','N') as newFlag, IF(IFNULL(sfi.DATE_FROM,'2000-01-01')>=concat(left(#{period},4),'-01-01'),'Y','N') as newFundFlag, SM.FUTURE_MATTERS_DISCLOSURE_MODE AS fmdm FROM SYS_FUND_INFO sfi, SYS_MGRCOMPANY SM WHERE 1 = 1 AND SFI.FIRM_CODE = SM.COMPANY_CODE AND sfi.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sfi.FUND_ID = #{fundId} LIMIT 1

SELECT P.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM AS accountNum, p.REVEAL_ITEM as revealItem, P.AMOUNT_CURRENT AS amountCurrent, P.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR AS crAmountAdj, P.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR AS drAmountAdj, P.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST AS amountAuditLast FROM wp_p P where 1 = 1 and P.STATUS = 'Y' and P.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT SFI.FUND_ID FROM SYS_FUND_INFO SFI WHERE SFI.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND NOT exists (SELECT 1 FROM sys_acctmapping SA WHERE SA.FUND_ID = SFI.FUND_ID AND SA.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM = '3003' AND SA.ATTR1="ETF_证券清算款") AND SFI.ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT P300.ATTR1 AS detailName, IFNULL(P300.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY,0) AS beginBalance, IFNULL(P300.DR_AMOUNT_CNY,0) AS drAmount, IFNULL(P300.CR_AMOUNT_CNY,0) AS crAmount, P300.ATTR5 as disc FROM wp_p300 P300 where 1 = 1 and P300.STATUS = 'Y' and P300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P300.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P400.ATTR1 AS detailName, IFNULL(P400.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY,0) AS beginBalance, IFNULL(P400.DR_AMOUNT_CNY,0) AS drAmount, IFNULL(P400.CR_AMOUNT_CNY,0) AS crAmount, P400.ATTR5 as disc FROM wp_p400 P400 where 1 = 1 and P400.STATUS = 'Y' and P400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P400.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P400S.ITEM as item, P400S.CONTRACT_AMOUNT as contractAmount, DATE_FORMAT(P400S.CONTRACT_FROM_DATE,'%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00.000') as contractBeginDate, DATE_FORMAT(P400S.CONTRACT_TO_DATE,'%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00.000') as contractEndDate, P400S.PERIOD_EXPENSE as thisPeriodFee, P400S.EXPENSE_ENTERED as incomeFee, P400S.ACCURED_EXPENSE as quota, P400S.DEFERRED_EXPENSE as amortization, P400S.EXPENSE_DIRECT_ENTERED as directFee FROM wp_p400_summary P400S where 1 = 1 and P400S.STATUS = 'Y' and P400S.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P400S.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P400D.PAPER as detailName, P400D.CONFIRMATION_NUM as confirmationNum, P400D.CONTRACT_AMOUNT as contractAmount, DATE_FORMAT(P400D.CONTRACT_FROM_DATE,'%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00.000') as contractBeginDate, DATE_FORMAT(P400D.CONTRACT_TO_DATE,'%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00.000') as contractEndDate, P400D.TOTAL_DATE as contractTotalDays, P400D.PERIOD_DATE as daysOfThisPeriod FROM wp_p400_detail P400D where 1 = 1 and P400D.ITEM = '信息披露费' and P400D.STATUS = 'Y' and P400D.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P400D.PERIOD = #{period} order by P400D.SEQ

SELECT P500.ATTR1 AS detailName, IFNULL(P500.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY,0) AS beginBalance, IFNULL(P500.DR_AMOUNT_CNY,0) AS drAmount, IFNULL(P500.CR_AMOUNT_CNY,0) AS crAmount, P500.ATTR5 as disc FROM wp_p500 P500 where 1 = 1 and P500.STATUS = 'Y' and P500.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P500.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P600.ATTR5 as tradeMarket, P600.ATTR2 as subType, sum(case when P600.ATTR1 = '成本' then ifnull(P600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY,0) else 0 end) as costBeginBalance, sum(case when P600.ATTR1 = '成本' then ifnull(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY,0) else 0 end) as costEndBalance, sum(case when P600.ATTR1 = '利息支出' then ifnull(P600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY,0) else 0 end) as interestBeginBalance, sum(case when P600.ATTR1 = '利息支出' then ifnull(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY,0) else 0 end) as interestEndBalance FROM wp_p600 P600 where 1 = 1 and P600.STATUS = 'Y' and P600.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600.PERIOD = #{period} GROUP BY P600.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM,P600.ATTR5,P600.ATTR2

SELECT IF(SUM(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY) = 0, null, SUM(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY)) as endBalance FROM wp_p600 P600 where 1 = 1 and P600.STATUS = 'Y' and P600.ATTR5 = '银行间' and P600.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT IF(SUM(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY) = 0, null, SUM(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY)) as endBalance, IF(SUM(P600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY) = 0, null, SUM(P600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY)) as beginBalance FROM wp_p600 P600 where 1 = 1 and P600.STATUS = 'Y' and P600.ATTR5 = '银行间' and P600.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT IF(SUM(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY) = 0, null, SUM(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY)) as endBalance, IF(SUM(P600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY) = 0, null, SUM(P600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY)) as beginBalance FROM wp_p600 P600 where 1 = 1 and P600.STATUS = 'Y' and P600.ATTR5 != '银行间' and P600.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT IF(SUM(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY) = 0, null, SUM(P600.END_BALANCE_CNY)) as endBalance, IF(SUM(P600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY) = 0, null, SUM(P600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY)) as beginBalance FROM wp_p600 P600 where 1 = 1 and P600.STATUS = 'Y' and P600.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT P600T.ATTR3 as `code`, P600T.ATTR4 as simpleName, P600T.ATTR5 as market, P600T.ATTR2 as subType, P600T.EY_INDEX as `index`, P600T.END_BALANCE_CNY as endBalance, P600T.FIRST_ACCOUNT_DAY as firstAccountDay, P600T.DUE_ACCOUNT_DAY as dueAccountDay, P600T.PERIOD_LEFT as periodLeft, P600T.DUE_AMOUNT as dueAmount, P600T.BUY_OUT_BOND as byOutBond, P600T.VALUATION_DAY as valuationDay, P600T.ACCRUED_INTEREST_CLIENT AS accruedInterestClient FROM wp_p600_test P600T WHERE 1 = 1 and P600T.STATUS = 'Y' and P600T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600T.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P600T.ATTR3 as `code`, P600T.ATTR4 as simpleName, P600T.ATTR5 as market, P600T.ATTR2 as subType, P600T.EY_INDEX as `index`, P600T.END_BALANCE_CNY as endBalance, P600T.FIRST_ACCOUNT_DAY as firstAccountDay, P600T.DUE_ACCOUNT_DAY as dueAccountDay, P600T.PERIOD_LEFT as periodLeft, P600T.DUE_AMOUNT as dueAmount, P600T.BUY_OUT_BOND as byOutBond, P600T.VALUATION_DAY as valuationDay, P600T.ACCRUED_INTEREST_CLIENT AS accruedInterestClient FROM wp_p600_test P600T WHERE 1 = 1 and P600T.STATUS = 'Y' and P600T.ATTR5 = '银行间' and P600T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600T.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P600T.ATTR3 as `code`, P600T.ATTR4 as simpleName, P600T.ATTR5 as market, P600T.ATTR2 as subType, P600T.EY_INDEX as `index`, P600T.END_BALANCE_CNY as endBalance, P600T.FIRST_ACCOUNT_DAY as firstAccountDay, P600T.DUE_ACCOUNT_DAY as dueAccountDay, P600T.PERIOD_LEFT as periodLeft, P600T.DUE_AMOUNT as dueAmount, P600T.BUY_OUT_BOND as byOutBond, P600T.VALUATION_DAY as valuationDay, P600T.ACCRUED_INTEREST_CLIENT AS accruedInterestClient FROM wp_p600_test P600T WHERE 1 = 1 and P600T.STATUS = 'Y' and P600T.ATTR5 != '银行间' and P600T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600T.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT HP100.HEAD_ID AS headId, HP100.ATTR3 AS `code`, HP100.ATTR4 AS shortName, HP100.ATTR5 AS market, HP100.ATTR2 AS subtype, HP100.END_BALANCE_CNY AS endBalanceCny, HP100.FIRST_ACCOUNT_DAY AS firstAccountDay, HP100.DUE_ACCOUNT_DAY AS dueAccountDay, HP100.DUE_AMOUNT AS dueAmount, HP100.BUY_OUT_BOND AS buyOutBond, HP100.VALUATION_DAY AS valuationDay, HP100.EXPOSURE_PERIOD AS exposurePeriod, HP100.ACCRUED_INTEREST_CLIENT AS accruedInterestClient FROM wp_hp100 HP100 WHERE 1 = 1 AND HP100.STATUS = 'Y' AND HP100.TYPE= 'P600' AND HP100.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND HP100.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P600S.ACCRUED_INTEREST_EY AS accruedInterestEy, P600S.ACCRUED_INTEREST_CLIENT AS accruedInterestClient, P600S.DIFF AS diff FROM wp_p600_summary P600S WHERE 1 = 1 and P600S.STATUS = 'Y' and P600S.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600S.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT P600TD.HEAD_ID as headerId, P600TD.BOND_CODE AS bondCode, P600TD.BOND_NAME AS bondName, P600TD.RETURN_DAY AS returnDay, P600TD.PRICE AS price, P600TD.QUANTITY AS quantity, P600TD.AMOUNT AS amount, P600T.BUY_OUT_BOND AS byOutBond FROM wp_p600_test P600T INNER JOIN wp_p600_test_detail P600TD ON P600TD.HEAD_ID = P600T.HEAD_ID AND P600TD.STATUS = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 and P600T.STATUS = 'Y' and P600T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600T.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P600EP.PERIOD_LEFT as periodLeft, P600EP.AMOUNT as amount FROM wp_p600_exposure_period P600EP WHERE 1 = 1 and P600EP.STATUS = 'Y' and P600EP.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P600EP.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY P600EP.SORT

SELECT P800.ATTR1 as type, P800.ATTR2 as tradeDetailName, P800.ATTR5 as commissionDetailName, P800.ATTR6 as related, P800.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, P800.DR_AMOUNT_CNY as drAmount, P800.CR_AMOUNT_CNY as crAmount FROM wp_N500 P800 where 1 = 1 and P800.STATUS = 'Y' and P800.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P800.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P800R.RELEATED_PARTY as `name`, P800R.COMMISSION as commission, P800R.PROPORTION_TOTAL as proportionTotal, P800R.END_BALANCE as endBalance, P800R.PROPORTION_BALANCE as proportionBalance FROM wp_N500_related P800R where 1 = 1 and P800R.STATUS = 'Y' and P800R.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P800R.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P810.AGENCY_NAME as `name`, P810.RELEATED as related, P810.AMOUNT_BOND as bond, P810.AMOUNT_FUND as fund, P810.AMOUNT_REPO as repo, P810.AMOUNT_STOCK as stock, P810.AMOUNT_WARRANT as warrant, P810.ACTUAL_COMMISSION_EY as perEY, P810.ACTUAL_COMMISSION_CLIENT as perClient FROM wp_N510 P810 where 1 = 1 and P810.STATUS = 'Y' and P810.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P810.PERIOD = #{period} order by P810.SEQ

SELECT P810R.AGENCY_NAME as `name`, P810R.AMOUNT_BOND as bond, P810R.AMOUNT_FUND AS fund, P810R.AMOUNT_REPO as repo, P810R.AMOUNT_STOCK as stock, P810R.AMOUNT_WARRANT as warrant FROM wp_N510_related P810R where 1 = 1 and P810R.STATUS = 'Y' and P810R.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P810R.PERIOD = #{period} order by P810R.SEQ

SELECT P810C.SAHRE_TURNOVER_AMOUNT AS ShareTurnoverAmount, P810C.COMMISSION_AMOUNT_ESTIMATE AS CommissionAmountEstimate, P810C.COMMISSION_AMOUNT_ACTUAL AS CommissionAmountActual, P810C.COMMISSION_RATE_ESTIMATE AS CommissionRateEstimate, P810C.COMMISSION_RATE_ACTUAL AS CommissionRateActual, P810C.SAHRE_TURNOVER_AMOUNT_LAST AS ShareTurnoverAmountLast, P810C.COMMISSION_AMOUNT_LAST AS CommissionAmountLast, P810C.COMMISSION_RATE_LAST AS CommissionRateLast, P810C.TE AS TE, P810C.DEVIATION_AMOUNT AS DeviationAmount, P810C.DEVIATION_RATE AS DeviationRate FROM wp_p810_commission P810C where 1 = 1 and P810C.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P810C.PERIOD = #{period} and P810C.STATUS = 'Y' LIMIT 1

SELECT P810CC.FUND_ID_COMPARABLE AS FundIdComparable, P810CC.SHORT_NAME_COMPARABLE AS ShortNameComparable, P810CC.SAHRE_TURNOVER_AMOUNT AS ShareTurnoverAmount, P810CC.COMMISSION_AMOUNT AS CommissionAmount, P810CC.COMMISSION_RATE AS commissionRate FROM wp_p810_commission_comparable P810CC where 1 = 1 and P810CC.STATUS = 'Y' and P810CC.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P810CC.PERIOD = #{period} order by P810CC.SORT

SELECT P800.ATTR1 AS detailName, IFNULL(P800.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY,0) AS beginBalance, IFNULL(P800.DR_AMOUNT_CNY,0) AS drAmount, IFNULL(P800.CR_AMOUNT_CNY,0) AS crAmount, P800.ATTR5 as disc FROM wp_p800 P800 where 1 = 1 and P800.STATUS = 'Y' and P800.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P800.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT P10000.ITEM as item, P10000.REF_NUM as refnum, IF(P10000.BEGIN_BALANCE = 0, null, P10000.BEGIN_BALANCE) as beginBalance, IF(P10000.END_BALANCE = 0, null, P10000.END_BALANCE) as endBalance FROM wp_p10000 AS P10000 where 1 = 1 and P10000.STATUS = 'Y' and P10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P10000.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY P10000.SORT

SELECT IF(SUM(P10000.BEGIN_BALANCE) = 0, null, SUM(P10000.BEGIN_BALANCE)) as beginBalance, IF(SUM(P10000.END_BALANCE) = 0, null, SUM(P10000.END_BALANCE)) as endBalance FROM wp_p10000 AS P10000 where 1 = 1 and P10000.STATUS = 'Y' and P10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P10000.PERIOD = #{period} and P10000.SORT NOT IN ('5','6') LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(P10000.END_BALANCE, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(P10000.BEGIN_BALANCE, 0)) FROM wp_p10000 AS P10000 where 1 = 1 and P10000.STATUS = 'Y' and P10000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and P10000.PERIOD = #{period}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( st.TRX_DATE, '%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00.000' ) AS TRX_DATE, st.COMMENTS AS COMMENTS FROM sys_trxcalendar st WHERE 1 = 1 AND st.COMMENTS is not null ORDER BY st.TRX_DATE
